commit.message:
Rollup merge of #98067 - klensy:compiler-deps2, r=Dylan-DPC

compiler: remove unused deps

Removed unused dependencies in compiler crates and moves few `libc` under `target.cfg(unix)` .

Rollup merge of #98067 - klensy:compiler-deps2, r=Dylan-DPC

compiler: remove unused deps

Removed unused dependencies in compiler crates and moves few `libc` under `target.cfg(unix)` .
